original_text: ‘If someone wants to obey me, he must live like this: He must love me more than he loves his own father and mother. He must love me more than he loves his wife and his children. He must love me more than he loves his brothers and his sisters. He must even love me more than he loves himself. If he does not do that, he cannot be one of my disciples.
korean_text: 무릇 내게 오는 자가 자기 부모와 처자와 형제와 자매와 더욱이 자기 목숨까지 미워하지 아니하면 능히 내 제자가 되지 못하고

sentences.original_text: If someone wants to obey me
He must love me more than he loves his own father and mother
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 아버지와 어머니보다 나를 더 사랑해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must love me more than he loves his wife and his children
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 아내와 자녀들보다 나를 더 사랑해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must love me more than he loves his brothers and his sisters
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 형제들과 자매들보다 나를 더 사랑해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must even love me more than he loves himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 심지어 자기 자신보다도 나를 더 사랑해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: If he does not do that
he cannot be one of my disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나의 제자가 될 수 없습니다
